name: Space Breaker
description:
FREE for LIMITED TIME!! (Priced $0.99). DOWNLOAD NOW BEFORE IT GOES BACK TO PAID!

Move the piece around the board to create lines of 3 pieces of the same color, thus breaking them in space. The goal is to keep the board from filling up as long as you can.

* Play with your friend via Facebook or Twitter

* Outstanding power-ups and special power to boost your score

* Play and see the beauty of simple!
